text: Front Porch | Front End Developer | Full-time | Sonora, CA (Local or Remote) Please Submit resumes to nschader@frontporch.com We are looking for a skilled Front End Developer (local or remote) to work on a brand new user interface for our recently acquired Get More Math product. Get More Math was developed by a math teacher to provide cumulative, personalized learning for every student and promote long-term retention. You will be working with a small, agile team on the interface that teachers use to manage their classes.
